name: Cartoonia
description:
Hey, wake up...are you okay?

You've seemed to have woken up in a brand new world completely different from your own! Fight monsters and befriend animals and much more to try and get back home!

This game is a prototype and may or may not be updated in the future, this depends on the overall success of this prototype version!

There are still a lot of things left to add if there could be an update, like unique assets and side quests and such, etc!
